name: Flippy Knife
description:
Flip the knife in beautiful nature! Become a great Master of knife flipping using the best knives from all over the world. Never give up!

- physics-based realistic knife simulator game
- over 35 world famous blades, collect them all
- different locations for flipping: camping, forest hut, tree tops...
- one finger control
- share and compete with friends to become the best!

Follow Flippy Knife on Facebook!
https://www.facebook.com/BeresnevGames/
